headline: Halliburton Appoints New Western Hemisphere President
summary: HOUSTON, January 14, 2026--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) announced today that Casey Maxwell, senior vice president North America Land, has been promoted to president, Western Hemisphere, effective Feb. 1, 2026.
